00017     void TrackProcessSaver::preTracking(const G4Track* aTrack) {
00018         auto trackInfo = dynamic_cast<UserTrackInformation*>(aTrack->GetUserInformation());
00019         const G4VProcess* process = aTrack->GetCreatorProcess();
00020         if (process) {
00021             for (const auto& processName : processNames_) {
00022                 if (exactMatch_[processName]) {
00023                     if (!processName.compare(process->GetProcessName())) {
00024                         trackInfo->setSaveFlag(true);
00025                     }
00026                 } else {
00027                     if (process->GetProcessName().find(processName) != std::string::npos) {
00028                         trackInfo->setSaveFlag(true);
00029                     }
00030                 }
00031             }
00032             if (trackInfo->getSaveFlag()) {
00033                 if (verbose_ > 1) {
00034                     std::cout << "[ TrackProcessSaver ] : saving track ID " << aTrack->GetTrackID() << " with process '" << process->GetProcessName() << "'" << std::endl;
00035                 }
00036             }
00037         }
00038     }
